All Implemented Interfaces:
GrailsConstraintClass
class DefaultGrailsConstraintClass
extends org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.AbstractInjectableGrailsClass

Grails artefact class which represents a custom Constraint Constraint.

author:
Geoff Lane
since:
0.1

setHibernateTemplate

public void setHibernateTemplate(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext applicationContext)
Make the hibernateTemplate available to persisent constraints
param:
applicationContext The application context used to lookup the hibernate SessionFactory

setParameter

public void setParameter(java.lang.Object constraintParameter)
The value that was passed to the constraint parameter. This will be avilable as 'params' in a constraint.
param:
constraintParameter The value to make available in params

supports

public boolean supports(java.lang.Class aClass)
Delegates the supports to the defined constraint
param:
aClass The type to check
return:
True if the constraint can be applied to this type

validate

public boolean validate(Object[] params)
Delegates the validation to the defined constraint
param:
params The parameters to pass to the constraint closure
return:
True if the validation passed or false if it failed.
